title: Stem cells.
summary: Stem cells offer the potential of new therapies for previously untreatable diseases. This session focuses on different aspects of stem cells from embryonic stem cells to adult stem cells and the biology and therapeutic impac â€¦
abstract: Stem cells offer the potential of new therapies for previously untreatable diseases. This session focuses on different aspects of stem cells from embryonic stem cells to adult stem cells and the biology and therapeutic impact of cancer stem cells.
